title: Invincibility Begins With A Broken Hand
alternative_title: Invincibility Begins With a Broken Hand ; Invincible Starts with a Severed Hand ; Wudi Cong Duan Shou Kaishi ; Wúdí Cóng Duàn Shǒu Kāishǐ ; 无敌从断手开始
status: Invincibility Begins With a Broken Hand ; Invincible Starts with a Severed Hand ; Wudi Cong Duan Shou Kaishi ; Wúdí Cóng Duàn Shǒu Kāishǐ ; 无敌从断手开始
description:
Description :
        Read Invincibility Begins with a Broken HandChu Mingxuan, the weakest Awakener, faces death after being swallowed by a giant beast. Yet, in his darkest moment, he unexpectedly inherits a mysterious system. From that day forward, he begins an unstoppable ascent to godhood, growing stronger with each challenge.But the secrets behind Awakeners and the origins of the system remain shrouded in mystery. Beneath the surface of this seemingly calm world, dark forces are at play. A blo*** and catastrophic revolution is about to erupt, shaking the very foundation of existence.
